content:
@stream where can I find the original lean syntax-definition/macro/notation for "lambda sugar"?
i.e. the "dot" in (Â· + 1) (which makes this whole expression mean the same as fun a => a + 1)

I looked in the Init/Notation.lean file and it doesn't appear to be there
This probably makes more sense in #lean4, though the zulip mobile app doesn't let me move the thread
